QuestData.Title: Earning Your Wings...
QuestData.RewardText: So you wanna join the Skybreakers, eh? You've certainly proven yourself an able Dragonmaw but that means nothing in the skies of Outland. The question has to be answered: CAN YOU FLY?$B$BAnd I don't just mean being able to mount up on a nether drake and delivering a shipment of crystals to the fort like those transporter scrubs. I'm talking about being the best... The top orc...$B$BOver to the west there are six riders. Defeat them all and I will grant you Skybreaker wings.
